name: Egypt Air Business Class - 777-300ER  Heathrow to Cairo in style
description:
This flight review video features Egypt Air business class on the Boeing 777-300ER aircraft from London Heathrow to Cairo.   Egypt Air is part of Star Alliance so flies from Heathrow Terminal 2 - also known as The Queen's Terminal. 

This flight review video feature the Air Canada business class lounge at Heathrow, boarding, take-off, in-flight entertainment, in-flight meals and the Egypt Air business class seat which reclines into a fully flat bed.   The Egypt Air cabin crew on this flight provided an excellent in-flight service.
